Glenn K. Davidson
Presidential Executive Fellow and Executive Director of Enterprise Services at U.S. Department of Commerce
October 27, 2015, Cory worked with Glenn K. but at different companies

I have known Glenn for over 10 years working with him on different projects while at EquaTerra and KPMG.  Glenn has always been someone who I've admired because of his integrity and consistent passion for the public sector.  Glenn's life work has always been about transforming the way that government do business and has challenged them to think different by leveraging shared services, in-sourcing, and outsourcing where it makes sense.  Glenn is someone who I trust and who I've gone to when searching for answers.  I highly recommend him; a truly exceptional person.

Tasha Gabal
Global Sales Manager, Multi-National Accounts at ADP
January 16, 2013, Cory managed Tasha directly

Tasha is one of the best sales reps that I've ever had the pleasure of managing.  She is a detail oriented hunter that really thinks through a deal.  She does a great job of getting to the top to find the key business drivers and leverages those along with excellent relationships to drive a deal top down.  Tasha also does a great job of leading the internal sales team and collaborating closely with them to make sure that everyone is in sync.  She listens to others feedback and effectively integrates that into the strategy.
